tosdr.tldr:
By signing up for Telegram, you accept our Privacy Policy and agree not to:
1. Use our service to send spam or scam users.
2. Promote violence on publically viewable Telegram channels, bots, etc.
3. Post illegal pornographic content on publically viewable Telegram channels, bots, etc.
tosdr.case: The terms for this service are easy to read

title: The terms for this service are easy to read
